package Operators;

// Write a program that calculates velocity using a constant distance and a constant time.
class Calc {
	 static double speed(double d, double t) {
		if (t == 0) {
			return 0;
		} else {
			return d / t;
		}
	}
}

public class Ex_4 {
	/**
	 * 
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Operators / Ex_4");

		double d = 100;
		double t = 5;

		System.out.println("distance = " + d);
		System.out.println("time = " + t);
		double s = Calc.speed(d, t);
		System.out.println("speed = " + s);
	}

}
